original_text: from thirty years old up to fifty years old, everyone who could come on duty for service in the tent of meeting—
korean_text: 삼십 세부터 오십 세까지 회막 봉사에 참여하여 일할 만한 모든 자라

sentences.original_text: from thirty years old up to fifty years old,
everyone who could come on duty for service
sentences.korean_translation: 봉사를 위해 근무할 수 있는 모든 자
